mergePositions(address,address,uint256).notice: Merge conditional collateral (YES/NO) back into base collateral `token` for `proposal`. Transfers both conditional legs from `msg.sender` and mints `token`.

splitPosition(address,address,uint256).notice: Split base collateral `token` into conditional YES/NO for `proposal`.
